properties.name: spring.freemarker.allow-request-override
properties.description: Whether HttpServletRequest attributes are allowed to override (hide) controller generated model attributes of the same name. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.allow-session-override
properties.description: Whether HttpSession attributes are allowed to override (hide) controller generated model attributes of the same name. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.cache
properties.description: Whether to enable template caching. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.content-type
properties.description: Content-Type value. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.expose-request-attributes
properties.description: Whether all request attributes should be added to the model prior to merging with the template. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.expose-session-attributes
properties.description: Whether all HttpSession attributes should be added to the model prior to merging with the template. Only supported with Spring MVC.

properties.name: spring.freemarker.expose-spring-macro-helpers
properties.description: Whether to expose a RequestContext for use by Spring's macro library, under the name "springMacroRequestContext". Only supported with Spring MVC.
